description: Bitvert has a widescreen approach to art that covers projection, audio, moving image and 2D media. Projects include music production and large-scale image projection. Recently (2019) he projected images onto London architecture for the release of Thom Yorke’s album. ANIMA in collaborating with Tarik Barri and Creative Giants.  Bitvert also curated and performed on the Gas Tower Stage at the pioneering VR ‘Lost Horizon’ festival.   His work with projection evolved from a stint of guerrilla advert
